name: The circumfence
description: This is the end of the world, both literally and figuratively... Surrounding the circumference of the world is a large (circum-)fence. Alot of junk gets caught here, like hats and such.
clue: A person who wears a wizards hat looks alot like a wizard, don't you agree?

items.name: Wizards hat
items.description: A large pointy hat that wizards use. It smells like fish(but wizards have a poor sence of smell anyways).
